item.title: Jekyll & Cookies[Mini-Post]
item.description: In May 2011 the EU passed a law that affects all cookie enabled websites. A cookie enabled website now needs to inform those who visit thier site that they are using cookies. If this is your first time on my site you would have seen the below. CookieConsent I use cookies to track traffic and user behaviour on my site. My blog is created through Beautiful Jekyll and it took me a little while to implement this.
